newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Moroccan c. bank made no new injection at auction.
newsitem.headline: Moroccan c. bank made no new injection at auction.

text.p: The Moroccan Bank al-Maghrib (central bank) made no new injection into the money market for one week at its repurchase auction on Wednesday, a bank official said.
The bank said it received bids totalling 6.418 billion dirhams and allocated 2.500 billion dirhams at a seven-percent interest rate for one week.
The amount allocated was equal to 2.500 billion dirhams leaving the market this week, the source said.
The bank satisfied 38.95 percent of demand for liquidity, it said.
The next auction will be on August 28.
